# Trust

warden

OG Warden

Direct booking through Twitter / Trust Security website

## Highlights

  * [#1 Warden of the past year](https://app.auditcrew.xyz/code4rena/leaderboard)

  * [Trust Security founder and auditor](https://www.trust-security.xyz/)

Leveraging the experience in the competitive security landscape in order to
provide the top-quality private auditing for our clients.

  * [Immunefi leaderboard](https://immunefi.com/leaderboard/)

One of the top hackers on Immunefi with $250k winnings and dozens of paid
high-severity findings.

  * [Led Optimism Sherlock contest w/ Zach Obront](https://app.sherlock.xyz/audits/contests/38)

We achieved 1st place and received $213k in rewards.

## Trust's Activity

The Activity Stream is currently in beta. [Share feedback here](/help).

## About

Top eco-system whitehat determined to make Web3 safe for the average adopter.

  * [Twitter](https://twitter.com/trust__90)
  * [Website](https://www.trust-security.xyz/)
